params.name: -b, --buildpack BUILDPACK
params.desc: buildpack url to use for this app

params.name: -n, --no-remote
params.desc: do not create a git remote

params.name: -r, --remote REMOTE
params.desc: the git remote to create, default "heroku"

params.name: -s, --stack STACK
params.desc: the stack to create the app on

params.name: --addons ADDONS
params.desc: comma-delimited list of addons to install

params.name: --region REGION
params.desc: specify region for the app to run in

params.name: --space SPACE
params.desc: the private space to create the app in

params.name: --ssh-git
params.desc: use SSH git protocol for local git remote
